channel.title: Vigor by Xiejra
channel.description: this track has been in waiting for over 2 months now. after Auxy BTC #20 i decided to create a full track out of it. i put a lot of effort in this (this track alone under went 13 versions) i’ve learnt a lot from the production of this track and i am considering making an EP soon. Anyways i hope you enjoy! listen to it here —-> https://soundcloud.com/xiejramusic/xiejra-vigor my best work enjoy!

item.title: Vigor by Xiejra
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Awesome, a bit long for my tastes BUT you kept it moving along and kept it interesting so I didn’t stop listening. This checks A LOT of boxes, you’ve got a lot of throaty bass going on and I’m digging it. The piano parts are quite exquisite. Well done!

Read full topic

item.title: Vigor by Xiejra
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
this track has been in waiting for over 2 months now. after Auxy BTC #20 i decided to create a full track out of it. i put a lot of effort in this (this track alone under went 13 versions) i’ve learnt a lot from the production of this track and i am considering making an EP soon. Anyways i hope you enjoy! listen to it here —-> https://soundcloud.com/xiejramusic/xiejra-vigor my best work enjoy!
